import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore,combineReducers}from"redux";import{thunk}from"redux-thunk";// Named import
import blockchainReducer from"./blockchain/blockchainReducer";import dataReducer from"./data/dataReducer";// Combine Reducers
const rootReducer=combineReducers({blockchain:blockchainReducer,data:dataReducer});// Middleware and Enhancers
const middleware=[thunk];const composeEnhancers=typeof window!=='undefined'&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;// Configure Store
const store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
